English: Nanyuan or "Southern Park", an imperial hunting domain during the Yuan, Ming and Qing Dynasties, now the site of Nanhaizi Park in the south of Beijing

d.f: `在~`北平市~`南~`永~`定~`門外~`二~`十~`里~`處~，`為~`歷代~`皇帝~`遊獵~`的~`圍場~。

English: Nanyuan or "Southern Park", an imperial hunting domain during the Yuan, Ming and Qing Dynasties, now the site of Nanhaizi Park in the south of Beijing
